::Battera::

She couldn't swim.  But that wasn't going to stop her any.
"I'd love to see the ocean. Let's go." She hoped tha he might teach 
her to swim in bot mode. Her beast mode was equipped for flying, not 
swimming.  But her bot mode would allow it.  At least she hoped it 
would. 

--------Original Message------
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He smiled at Battera's words. He knew that is would be 
impossible for her 
> to pick him up, but hey he did like the water.
>     "Do you swim? I'd like to go down to the ocean, I haven't been 
in beast 
> mode for a really long time." He asked her, he really hoped she did 
swim.
>
